courses.title: Matrix Algebra [10.0 credits]
courses.description: Matrix algebra covering eigenvalues/eigenvectors, canonical/Jordan forms, QR/SVD, matrix norms, perturbation theory, positive/stochastic matrices, Lyapunov stability, and matrix equations; course expected to take place March - June 2026 at KTH.

courses.title: Convex Optimization with Engineering Applications [6.0 credits]
courses.description: Convex sets/functions, LP/QP/geometric/SDP, duality, interior-point and decomposition methods, with applications in estimation, data fitting, control, and communications; course expected to take place March - May 2026 at KTH.

courses.title: Great Ideas in Learning and Control [5.0 credits]
courses.description: Explores foundational 20th-century concepts in ML and control theory: information theory, dynamical systems, extremum problems, feedback, statistical learning, and dynamic programming; course expected to take place February - March 2026 at Uppsala University.

courses.title: Context Engineering for Football [10.0 credits]
courses.description: Explores techniques for obtaining reliable output from LLMs and communicating data accessibly, based on building Twelve Earpiece; covers transformer architectures and their implications for LLM usage in software applications, with hands-on app development as exam; course expected to start February 23rd 2026 and take place at Uppsala University.
